pr_title: Fix 5725: Spider Check for JSON/YAML'ish content

timeline.bodyText: How about adding the toLowerCase() here and then it wont be needed later?
timeline.author: psiinon

timeline.bodyText: Calling message.getResponseBody().toString().toLowerCase() twice seems very inefficient. Maybe do it just once, and could extract the first 8 chrs rather than doing toLowerCase() on a potentially very large response?
timeline.author: psiinon

timeline.message:
Fix #5725: Spider Check for JSON/YAML'ish content

Content type check in canParseResource(Httpmessage, String,
boolean) is made more specific.

Signed-off-by: Akshath Kothari <akshath.kothari@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: String.substring will throw an exception if the body length is less than 8, so should check for that first.
timeline.author: psiinon

replies.bodyText: Of course! How silly of me to miss that.
replies.author: ricekot

timeline.bodyText: Should lower case with Locale.ROOT, to not rely on the default locale.
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: These checks might not work properly (e.g. if the OpenAPI has comments or when JSON which starts with {), some examples in https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/tree/master/examples
timeline.author: thc202
